inkball

类 LevelDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.LevelDisplay

  • public class LevelDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    The LevelDisplay class manages the loading and representation of a game level. It handles the initial layout of tiles and spawns defined in a specified layout file.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      LevelDisplay(App app, java.lang.String layoutFile)
      Constructor for the LevelDisplay class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法

      Creates a tile based on the type and position.
      java.util.List<Tile> getBallTile()
      Retrieves a list of ball position to be spawn from the board.
      Tile[][] getBoard()
      Gets the current state of the game board.

      Retrieves a list of spawn tiles from the board.

      Loads the level configuration from the layout file.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LevelDisplay

        public LevelDisplay(App app,
                    java.lang.String layoutFile)
        Constructor for the LevelDisplay class. Initializes the application reference, layout file, and board.
        参数:
        app - The main application instance.
        layoutFile - The path to the layout file.

    • 方法详细资料

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel()
        Loads the level configuration from the layout file. Initializes the board based on the characters defined in the file.

      • createTile

        protected Tile createTile(java.lang.String c,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        Creates a tile based on the type and position.
        参数:
        c - The type of the tile as a string.
        x - The x-coordinate of the tile.
        y - The y-coordinate of the tile.
        返回:
        A Tile object initialized with the specified type and position.

      • getSpawnTile

        public java.util.List<Tile> getSpawnTile()
        Retrieves a list of spawn tiles from the board.
        返回:
        A list of tiles that are spawn points.

      • getBallTile

        public java.util.List<Tile> getBallTile()
        Retrieves a list of ball position to be spawn from the board.
        返回:
        A list of tiles that represent balls.

      • getBoard

        public Tile[][] getBoard()
        Gets the current state of the game board.
        返回:
        A 2D array representing the board tiles.
